siteMetadata.title: BAD lab
siteMetadata.description: Lab website for Titipat Achakulvisut's lab at Mahidol University, Thailand

node.description: Python parser for PubMed and MEDLINE data written from our lab. It can be used to parse bulk of data or quickly get biomedical publications for analysis.
node.name: Pubmed Parser: A Python Parser for PubMed Open-Access XML Subset and MEDLINE XML Dataset

node.description: A tool for scientific claim extraction for scientific publication. It can also parse discourse from a given scientific abstract.
node.name: Claim Extraction for Scientific Publications

node.description: Deepcut is one of the Thai tokenizer which you can use easily with Thai text. Although, there are faster alternatives such as the PyThaiNLP library.
node.name: Deepcut: A Thai word tokenization library using Deep Neural Network.

node.description: A Python parser for scientific PDF based on GROBID and pdffigures2.
node.name: SciPDF Parser: A Python parser for scientific PDF files

node.description: Pyglmnet provides a wide range of noise models (and paired canonical link functions): 'gaussian', 'binomial', 'probit', 'gamma', 'poisson', and 'softplus'.
node.name: Pyglmnet: A python implementation of elastic-net regularized generalized linear models

node.excerpt:
Joining the lab might be overwhelming since we work on a broad range of applied machine learning
and natural language processing. As most of incoming students may come from biomedical background,
